name: Idle Galaxy
description:
Idle Galaxy is a relaxing idle clicker game. Though, it's challenging enough so you won't get bored. Unlike other idle games, you can fully complete this one and it won't take all your life to accomplish this.

Gameplay

Two game modes with different goals. Complete 20 main levels and then realize that your journey has just begun.

Upgrades

12 unique upgrades for you to buy. No useless items. Each one will help you to complete the game.

Perks

100 various perks in stock to make you even stronger. Bought them all? Reset perks saving all your progress and making them available for purchase again with slightly increased price.

Relaxation

Fancy graphics and meditative ambient music will make your journey even more comfortable. Just relax while you are playing this game.

Achievements

25 various achievements to track your progress. Will you be able to collect them all?

Graphics

Well, it's just simple but beautiful.

Miscellaneous

Photo mode to take beautiful screenshots. Runs in background so you can spend time for something else while it plays itself. Nothing unnecessary, just a pure gameplay.Immerse yourself in the amazing atmosphere of this game and you won't be disappointed.
